label: Beneficial ownership chain mapping
notes: Link operator freeholder PSCs directors and charges before publication

label: Company status and shell indicators
notes: Use dormant dissolved shell-like and newly formed signals with source links

label: Cross-body supplier matching

notes: Show repeat entities across multiple public bodies

label: Property-to-spend linking
notes: Join addresses postcodes and site names to transactions and contracts

label: Threshold-splitting detection
notes: Use as a risk signal not a standalone allegation

label: Temporal clustering and sudden activation
notes: Look for bursts around hotel activation policy changes or ownership shifts

label: Director overlap and network scoring
notes: Use co-director shared-address and linked-company graphs

label: Revolving-door and interest checks

label: Price volume and repeat-pattern anomalies
notes: Use peer comparisons and explain denominator limits

label: Secrecy-gap tracking
notes: Treat withheld site or owner visibility as a reportable system risk
